channel.title: Sky Dimension?
channel.description:
For those of you who don't regularly visit the minecraft forums, i suppose ill post some elements that i find are really awesome. It looks like notch is working on a new world called sky dimension, ive noticed a majority of people like the idea of floating islands high in the sky (Frell <3s his biochunk)
Early this morning Notch shared a brief preview of a new "sky dimension" that he worked on a bit last night. The new dimension looks to be a series of floating islands. While this was something Notch was probably just toying around with initially -- or joking about -- it looks like thanks to PC Gamer's quick reporting of the tweet, he's now decided to finish it. No other details are known about when this new sky dimension will make its way to Minecraft, but check out the screenshots below.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bpHybh.jpgg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/22HiDh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ck5sYh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fBZ4nh.pngg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0LFcBh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0bbKbh.png[/img] What are you thoughts so far? I think its going to be epic if it gets finished!

item.title: Sky Dimension?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Looks very, very sexy. Can’t wait for this to happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Sky Dimension?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:8, topic:395867”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=493054.msg3604837#msg3604837 date=1306006679]
Looks like it’d be called the Aether like most people have been wanting. Similar to the Nether, you need a portal to enter.
[/quote]

hes not using that mod i think[/quote]

He may not be using that mod but the concept is there. Notch said that he uses the ideas of mod creators as long as they fall within the idea of Minecraft. Pets, booster rails, and even “sky dimension” has always been originally mods by other people.

Read full topic

@asyo4 wrote:

Looks cool. however I recall playing on a map similiar to this called “Sky World”. Best of luck to Notch, that would be pretty badass to add that.

item.title: Sky Dimension?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

CoonHunter:

It is going to be nice, but I see flaws in the idea. (saw it a couple days ago), blocks generally go by depth and rarity on where they appear. How will we fibd diamond etc in that while still keeping it rare? What if we fall? Just a 2 tthings I am waiting for Nitch to respond on.

Im sure he can implement another type of depth perception for the different dimension.

As for falling off of the islands… i dont exactly know what would be done, either you hit a death barrier and die or you can be reset to your location before falling off (Problem with this is if you fall off of a high mountain while in sky dimension it could possibly reset you back to the top?)

Read full topic
